name: Do NOT overuse
description:
Do NOT overuse is a game made for Bullet Hell Game Jam. The theme was 10 seconds. The game is a roguelike and has two floors and one boss.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - LMB

Use vitamin C - Q

Use ketamine - E

Ketamine - increase game speed and your damage

Vitamin C - decrease game speed and your damage

They last for 10 seconds. Do not overuse them, it will kill you. Balance using vitamin and ketamine
